name: Convergence.Tech
description: Provides a Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) powered digital credential solution supporting the OpenCerts schema as well as the W3C Verifiable Credentials Data Model and Decentralized Identifiers.

name: Riverr
description: Provides a trusted universal industry standard for identification and health credentials. Riverr’s platform conforms to different workflows that require tamper-proof, verifiable documentation.

name: NextID Pte Ltd
description: Start producing the most attractive and trusted certificates, compliant with W3C verifiable credentials standards. We also now offer complete Web3 solutions for many industries.

name: Edufied
description: Edufied provides a  secured and decentralized system for Certificate Issuers, Individuals and Employers to store & verify certifications and credentials using Blockchain Technology.

name: Accredify
description: Enables institutions to issue tamper-proof digital certificates using the OpenCerts Schema.

name: Knowledge Catalyst Pte. Ltd.
description: Knowledge Catalyst offers a Software-as-a-Service to enable Institutions to issue tampered-proof credentials based on Opencerts schema and manage the entire Credential Life-Cycle Management.

name: R3D Singapore Pte Ltd
description: 3DCerts protocol is designed to create an added level of protection for certificate issuers (institutions or corporations), owners (students or users) and employers.

name: AOKpass
description: ICC AOKpass provides you with a digitally authenticated, secure and portable copy of your medical records, approved by a medical professional and accessible only by you.

name: JEDTrade
description: We enable enterprises to issue trusted and tamper-proof digital certificates using OpenCerts Schema. With our workflow engine, we allow enterprises to customize their business workflow.

name: FiO SG Pte Ltd
description: FiO is a blockchain SaaS platform. Similar to LEGO blocks, enterprises can easily plug APIs with self-customizations by use minimal programming skills (Low or Non code).

name: Institute of Blockchain
description: Institute of Blockchain® is an esteemed blockchain academia based in Singapore, on the mission to advance blockchain education and adoption in Asia-Pacific.

name: Superink Lte Ltd
description: Superink Pte Ltd is a blockchain based SaaS entity that builds a security layer on top of existing web3 applications for identity purposes. Our Industry-certified and government approved framework enabled us to create customisable and tamper-proofed APIs that doubled-proof the authenticity of our certs. Allowing users to get creative with their web3 applications.

name: FilPass Tamperproof Tech Inc
description: FilPass is a tamperproof Digital Identity that allows Filipinos to transact with agencies online securely.
